version_description:
Minor fixes.
international number fixed.
invalid authentication issue fixed

-new improvements
-card settlement enhancements
-change transfer pin bug fixed

1. Improved notification system.
2. Added Facebook , PlayStation , Skype Vouchers payments.
3. General improvements and fixes.

i. Ana Ow Shatarti Campaign
ii. New PALPAY services, such as Add TOP-UP Balance to Wataniya Mobile Merchant.
iii. General improvements and fixes.

- Biometric login support.
- View Alwasata portfolio (Al Wasata is a brokerage services financial subsidiary of the Bank of Palestine ).
- Improved Cards statement view , now statements can be viewed per card or per shadow account.
- Now switching between managed accounts can be done without logout.
- Performance improvement and bug fixes.

1. Security Enhancements.
2. General improvements and bug fixes.

1.Automatic read of OTP.
2.Subscription in BOP saving campaign “Tawfeerkom”.
3.Transfer Loyalty Points to Cash in PointCom campaign.
4.General bugs fixes.
Fix the application design issue in Dark mode.

1.Preferred FX rates.
2.Top-up Wallet balance
3.Many improvements on performance and bug fixes.
Many improvements on performance and bug fixes.

1. Pay to Friend within Bank of Palestine Group (Bank of Palestine - Arab Islamic Bank - PalPay Wallet).
2. Pay to Merchant ( Online ) by scanning QR code
3. Pay to Merchant ( Offline ) by generating QR code
4. Pay to Merchant by scanning QR Code that was generated by P.O.S machine.
